item.title: Hardware Privacy Policy
item.description: KOZY HARDWARE PRIVACY POLICY Last Updated: September 2025 This Hardware Privacy Policy describes how Kozymacro collects, uses, and protects information related to the Kozy Hardware device and its integration with our software services. SECTION I: INFORMATION WE COLLECT 1.1. Hardware Device Information When you use Kozy Hardware, we may collect: Device serial number and firmware version Hardware connectivity status and performance metrics Device usage patterns and feature utilization Error logs and diagnostic information from the device 1.
